title: Integrated Language Education Capstone Design: Practice-Based Project Development

context.prior_knowledge: Language education theories and experience in basic instructional design
context.additional_context: Development environment for customized language education projects using digital learning tools, producing implementable outcomes for real educational settings

learning_goals: Learners can integrate language education theories to develop a capstone project plan tailored to a specific educational context
Learners can develop customized language education materials based on learner proficiency levels using digital tools
Learners can complete an educational project reflecting peer feedback in a PBL (Project-Based Learning) environment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
